resources.string: Please select a TF2 class to learn more about them
Fastest member of the team with the smallest health.
Wields a shogun, pistol, and baseball bat; ideal for quick \"Hit and Run\" tactics.
Can double jump and capture objectives twice as fast.
A tough and well-armed member of the team.
Wields both a rocket launcher and a shotgun; capable for both offense and defense.
Best known for \"rocket jumping\" (where you detonate a rocket under yourself to launch upward).
Wields a shotgun and a flamethrower which can produce flames and airblasts.
Flames set enemies on fire, which burns them over time and reduces their healing by 50%.
Airblasts can push away enemies and reflect projectiles like rockets and grenades.
Defensive trapper wielding both a grenade and sticky bomb launcher.
Grenades can be launched at creative angles to demolish enemies while remaining safely out of sight.
Sticky Bombs can launched and stuck to any surface, then be detonated all at once at any time.
Toughest but slowest member of the team.
Wields a heavy minigun which shreds enemies in seconds as well as some \"food\".
\"Food\" builds up over time, and when full, can be used to heal himself or another teammate.
Specializes in constructing and maintaining buildings rather than fighting at the front lines.
Can build an auto turrent Sentry Gun, a health and ammo Dispenser, and entrance and exit Teleporters.
Each building must be built, upgraded, and repaired by the engineer during gameplay.
The primary healer of the team, wielding a Medigun to quickly heal teammates.
Teammates being healed at full health will have their health increased further up to 150% their base health.
While healing, medic slowly builds up an Uber meter which will make both the medic and patient invincible for 8 seconds when full.
An effective class at long range, but weakens with proximity.
Wields a Sniper Rifle which builds up charge when scoped, and loses all charge when unscoped.
The longer the charge, the greater the damage. Headshots guarantee critical hits.
Wields a knife, pistol, cloak, sapper, and disguise kit.
Can disguise himself as an enemy teammate, knife attack their back to instantly kill them,
cloak himself to be completely invisible, and sap the Engineer\'s buildings to disable and destroy them.
